BR_text.BRsummary: "test_conv_all" with benchdnn does not work correctly
BR_text.BRdescription:
The "inputs/conv/test_conv_all" uses these files.
 
 test_conv_f32
 test_conv_f32_nxc
 test_conv_gemm_f32
 test_conv_gemm_f32_nxc
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/fd70df1202ecc4ef1499db3e442c67a37c83e768>In the commit, </denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-code>commit fd70df1202ecc4ef1499db3e442c67a37c83e768
     benchdnn: inputs: conv: include bf16 testing in nightly scope
 </denchmark-code>
 
 these files were renamed with "_dt".
 <denchmark-h:h1>Version</denchmark-h>
 
 
 v1.8-rc
 master, dev-v2 branches
 
 <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 command: "./benchdnn --conv --batch=inputs/conv/test_conv_all
 returns
 cannot open file test_conv_f32

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/m-ymzk>@m-ymzk</denchmark-link>
 , thanks for pointing this out! Indeed the commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/fd70df1202ecc4ef1499db3e442c67a37c83e768>fd70df1</denchmark-link>
  did not properly update  (this test file is a special case that is kept mostly for developer convenience, meaning it is not run during CI). I will prepare a patch internally to fix it, sorry for the inconvenience!
 PS The dev-v2 branch is now obsolete as v2.x development has been moved to the master branch.

comments_1.comment_text: Thank you for your reply to correct it.

comments_2.comment_text:
You are very welcome! Though I should warn you that there are over 300k tests in that all-inclusive test suite:
 $ ./benchdnn --mode=L --conv --batch=test_conv_all | tail -n1
 tests:305764 passed:0 skipped:0 mistrusted:0 unimplemented:0 failed:0 listed:305764

comments_3.comment_text:
You are very welcome! Though I should warn you that there are over 300k tests in that all-inclusive test suite:
 $ ./benchdnn --mode=L --conv --batch=test_conv_all | tail -n1
 tests:305764 passed:0 skipped:0 mistrusted:0 unimplemented:0 failed:0 listed:305764
 
 Just in case, in hours it takes infinity and beyond!
